additional_info:
Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Sololaki astonishing apartment for sale
This spacious and western style-designed 72 square metres (775 sq feet) apartment is located just off Freedom Square, on the second floor (US third floor) of an excellent 19th century house at 5 Machabeli St.
This high ceiling flat comprises of a very large bedroom, open space living room and kitchen and modern stylish bathroom. The kitchen is completely renovated antique-style tastefully combined with modern amenities. The bedroom overlooks Machabeli Street while the living room, kitchen and the entrance are located on a beautiful terrace facing the hills. The apartment has four large double-glazed wooden windows (with old-style shutters) ensuring the accommodation is flooded with natural light.  
The apartment is ready to move in to and is equipped with renovated wooden floors in the living room and bedroom, tasteful floor tiles in the kitchen and bathroom; windows bars, alarm facilities, intercom, internet, and air conditioner.
The apartment is in excellent condition throughout and is a great place to live or as an investment to be rented out.
